role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs VSCode on nearly any system and installs specified extensions
role_description_full_overview: [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) is a freeware source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS. Features include support for debugging, syntax highlighting, intelligent code completion, snippets, code refactoring, and embedded Git.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs VSCode on nearly any system and installs specified extensions.
